name: Disco Dating
description:
Disco Elysium had too many kissable characters to not do this.

As a part of the official Disco(rd)'s Big Bang we made a little dating sim! There are three routes, Klaasje ("easy" mode), Smoker ("medium" mode), and Kim ("hard" mode). Each route has a Good and Bad end, do your best to not screw up the date!

LMB to progress dialogue and select choices.

Hit Escape at anytime to open the Pause Menu.
